Sentencas: The structural characterization, surface state and electrochemical performances of LnBaCo2O5+6 (LnBC) (Ln = La, Pr, Nd and Sm) perovskite cathode are systematically investigated for intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cells.
Titulo: Evaluation of perovskite oxides LnBaCo2O5+δ (Ln = La, Pr, Nd and Sm) as cathode materials for IT-SOFC

Sentencas: The structural symmetry gradually distorts with the reduced ionic radius.
Titulo: Evaluation of perovskite oxides LnBaCo2O5+δ (Ln = La, Pr, Nd and Sm) as cathode materials for IT-SOFC

Sentencas: The electrical conductivity decreases due to the increasing oxygen vacancy concentration from La to Sm. X-ray photoelectron spectroscopy analysis indicates that the concentration of oxygen active sites on the surface of LnBC samples decreases with shrinking Ln3+ radius.
Titulo: Evaluation of perovskite oxides LnBaCo2O5+δ (Ln = La, Pr, Nd and Sm) as cathode materials for IT-SOFC

Sentencas: The increasing Ln?O bond energy leads to the reduction of the thermal expansion coefficients.
Titulo: Evaluation of perovskite oxides LnBaCo2O5+δ (Ln = La, Pr, Nd and Sm) as cathode materials for IT-SOFC

Sentencas: The electrochemical performance of LnBC electrode decreases with the decreasing Ln3+ ionic radius.
Titulo: Evaluation of perovskite oxides LnBaCo2O5+δ (Ln = La, Pr, Nd and Sm) as cathode materials for IT-SOFC
